result.title: American House
result.description:
American House 2018

Notes:
- Almost the entire structure is collapsible.
- There is a balcony.
- There are two weights and dumbbells.
- There is a picture of a watermelon fighting against an apple.

result.title: Ordinary Two Storey House
result.description:
An ordinary two-storey house

• Through the doors you can pass
• Spacious 
• You cannot climb the stairs to the second floor (It is transparent)
• Empty interior

result.title: BT-7274 Robot
result.description:
BT 7274 Robot Mod

• Smooth hitboxes
• Beautiful
• Iron

result.title: Combat Robot
result.deskripsine:
- Easily demolish any building in 7 seconds
- Does not collapse

result.title: Construction Site Map
result.description:
Construction site map (re-uploading)
 
• A large building from the "classic melon" series
• Here you can make a machinima or a fighting game. 
• It is possible to do crash tests of the building.
• The construction itself just dilutes the game.

result.title: Elevator
result.description: The mod for Melon Playground adds a controlled elevator. The bottom button takes you to the second floor, and the top button takes you to the third floor. Pressing it again returns to the first floor.

result.title: Grocery Store
result.description:
Grocery store

Notes:
• Non-degradable 
• Cash desk available

result.title: Mansion
result.description: Pros: Has a guard, has a dog, furnished, big, cool

result.title: Mechanical Dragon
result.description: A large mechanical dragon that can spew flame. Not recommended for weak devices!

result.title: Model D-215
result.description:
This mech was created in 2024 Japan in 2026. The AI and armor have been improved

- Weapons: two flamethrowers, as well as arms
- No lag, agile, stable

result.title: Robotic Squid
result.description: Movable Robotic Squid - second version. Now if you blow up the Velcro in front of the tentacles, they will come off. The Velcro is shown in the image. (Right.)

result.title: Pirate Ship
result.description: Saving a large pirate ship (can shoot). Completely destructible construction.

result.title: Spinosaurus JP-3
result.description:
Spinosaurus save from Jurassic Park 3

• Exact copy
• Large, was as close as possible to the canon size of the film
• May fly apart!
• Not for weak devices
• Jaw moves, can eat
• Moving neck and tail, front paw

Must read

What can lead to a bug:
• Driving him by the snout back and forth
• Coups
• Strong bites

result.title: three_story_house_with_an_elevator
result.description:
A three-story building with an elevator!

Principle of operation of elevator:

- There are 4 buttons on the elevator, the lowest one turns on the elevator.
- The other three are responsible for the pistons that hold the elevator on any floor
